item.title: Why & How to Use one of the best Text Editors (vim)
item.description: In this post I’m hopefully going to convince you about the merits of using the vim text editor. Besides persuading you to use vim, I will try to give you a brief tutorial and equip you with all the basics as well as with some nifty tipps and tricks.
